content: Is this controlled by the .readthedocs.yml file in the root of the repo? I don't see any GitHub Actions for publishing docs. :thinking:
Is it even worth fixing? The plan is to move to mkdocs, I believe: https://github.com/gdcc/pyDataverse/pull/181
Hmm, I am not sure if it is worth it. We would need access to ReadTheDocs to check further why these have not been updated. I mean, except for the async requests, there are no big changes for users.
Ok, that's what I was thinking, that we'd need access to RTD. Ok, well, if anyone asks, we can point them to this topic.
